title: Need help for 'Could not connect to the http server'

embed.description: I have the same problem like two months ago but it got solved by the *netsh winsock reset* command I found on the Internet. However this...

body:
**I just copied and pasted my thread on reddit**

> I have the same problem like two months ago but it got solved by the netsh winsock reset command I found on the Internet
>  
> However this time, I tried several methods suggested in the old threads, it didn't work.
> Including:
> 1. turn off firewall and anti-virus software
> 2. netsh winsock reset
> 3. fix the text in system.cfg
> 4. run as administer
> 5. reboot pc
>  
> Finally I decided to uninstall League from my pc and tried download it again. Then something interesting happened the League installer could not connect to the server either...
>  
> I am lack of knowledge of this part. Could someone please help me with this? (Running Win.7)

replies.body:
um

if you find a solution to this


please tell me

;_;
Sigh, no one help me about this so I just reinstalled it but works well now anyway lol.

I did the same thing and it started working too.

ugh...
